cast.name: 弗拉基米尔·克里钦科 Wladimir Klitschko
阿克塞尔·施泰因 Axel Stein
基达·拉马丹 Kida Khodr Ramadan

this_title: Celebrity Hunted- Jede Spur kann Dich verraten Season 1
trans_title: 名人潜行追踪（德版） 第一季
introduction: 10 celebrities face the impossible task: submerging for 10 days. Chased by professional investigators with only little money to live on. Dr. Wladimir Klitschko, Axel Stein, Tom Beck, Stefanie Giesinger, Vanessa Mai, Andreas Ferber, Kida Khodr Ramadan, Summer Cem, Diana Bill & Melisa Kocak are on their run through Germany. Who will remain undetected in this game?
chinese_title: 名人潜行追踪（德版） 第一季
foreign_title: Celebrity Hunted- Jede Spur kann Dich verraten Season 1
